title: Galaxy S25 series prices leak, Realme Neo7 is official, Week 50 in review - GSMArena.com news - GSMArena.com
summary:
Galaxy S25 series prices leak, Realme Neo7 is official, Week 50 in review

Publication Date: December 2024

Source: Not specified

As we wrap up week 50 of 2024, key developments include potential pricing for the Galaxy S25 series and the official launch of Realme's Neo7 smartphone.

  • The Galaxy S25 series is expected to maintain the same pricing structure as the S24 series.
  • Upgrades include the Snapdragon 8 Elite processor and up to 12GB of RAM for the smaller model.
  • The S25 Ultra will feature a new 50MP ultra-wide camera while maintaining its main camera from the previous model.
  • Realme introduced the Neo7, equipped with a Dimensity 9300+ chipset and a large 7,000 mAh battery.
  • The Neo7 offers a 50MP main camera and an 8MP ultrawide, with prices starting from CNY 2,199 ($302).
  • Huawei's Mate 70 series highlights 100% domestic chip production in China, showcasing the Kirin 9020 chipset.
"Huawei has achieved 100% domestic production of chips, which is a testament to the true autonomy of the semiconductor industry in China." - Richard Yu, Huawei CEO

In summary, the Galaxy S25 series appears to follow in the footsteps of its predecessor in terms of pricing, while Realme's Neo7 and Huawei's advancements in domestic chip production are notable highlights of the week.

title: MobiKwik IPO: Know Latest GMP, Allotment, and Listing Dates - News18
summary:
MobiKwik IPO: Know Latest GMP, Allotment, and Listing Dates

Publication Date: December 15, 2024, 16:35 IST

Source: News18

MobiKwik's IPO has garnered significant attention, concluding with impressive subscription numbers and a strong expected debut on December 18, 2024.

  • The IPO received a total subscription rate of 125.69 times, with retail investors subscribing 141.78 times.
  • Unlisted shares are currently trading at Rs 444 per share, 59.14% higher than the upper price band of Rs 279.
  • The IPO allotment finalization is set for December 16, 2024, while the listing is scheduled for December 18, 2024.
  • The public issue consists entirely of fresh equity shares worth Rs 572 crore, with no Offer for Sale component.
  • MobiKwik secured Rs 257 crore from anchor investors prior to the IPO launch.
"MobiKwik’s unlisted shares are trading at Rs 444 per share, signaling a strong debut on December 18."

In conclusion, MobiKwik’s IPO has been met with strong market enthusiasm, positioning the company favorably in India’s fintech landscape as it prepares for its public market entry.

"My Career Made, Then Unmade By Gandhis": Mani Shankar Aiyar's Big Claim - NDTV
summary:
My Career Made, Then Unmade By Gandhis: Mani Shankar Aiyar's Big Claim

Date: Not specified Source: Press Trust of India

Senior Congress leader Mani Shankar Aiyar has claimed that the Gandhi family played a significant role in both his political rise and subsequent marginalization within the party.

  • Aiyar stated, "The irony of my life is that my political career was made by the Gandhis and unmade by the Gandhis."
  • He expressed frustration over a lack of substantial engagement with key members of the Gandhi family over the years.
  • Aiyar mentioned he did not have the opportunity to meet Sonia Gandhi for a decade and had only limited interactions with Rahul and Priyanka Gandhi.
  • He recalled needing to ask Priyanka to convey birthday wishes to Rahul during a period of his suspension from the party.
  • Aiyar wrote a letter to Rahul Gandhi seeking clarity on his suspension but received no acknowledgment.
  • He reflected on the political environment in 2012 during crises for both Sonia Gandhi and former PM Manmohan Singh, noting Pranab Mukherjee's potential leadership during that time.
“For 10 years, I was not given an opportunity to meet Sonia Gandhi one-on-one. I was not given an opportunity, except once, of spending any meaningful time with Rahul Gandhi.”

This interview sheds light on the complex dynamics within the Congress party and highlights Aiyar's personal experiences regarding his political journey influenced by the Gandhi family.

title: 25-year-old biker killed after being hit by bus in Mumbai, days after deadly Kurla accident - Hindustan Times
summary:
25-year-old biker killed after being hit by bus in Mumbai, days after deadly Kurla accident

Publication Date: Dec 15, 2024 Source: Hindustan Times

Days after a fatal bus accident in Kurla, a 25-year-old motorcyclist was killed when struck by a bus in Govandi, leading to the arrest of the bus driver and conductor.

  • The incident occurred at Shivaji Nagar junction in Govandi, where Dikshit Vinod Rajput was hit while riding his motorcycle.
  • Rajput suffered severe head injuries and was declared dead at Rajawadi Hospital.
  • Police arrested the bus driver, Vinod Aabaji Rankhambe, and conductor, Avinash Vikramrao Gite, under relevant legal sections.
  • This accident follows a serious bus crash in Kurla that killed seven people and injured 42 others.
  • The Kurla accident involved a bus colliding with multiple vehicles and structures, causing significant casualties.
  • There are concerns regarding the training of bus drivers for operating electric buses.
"The bus driver was not fully trained to deal with the electric bus, having received only a limited amount of training." - Regional Transport Officers (RTO)

This tragic event highlights ongoing safety concerns surrounding public transport in Mumbai, particularly with the operation of electric buses.

title: Delhi polls: AAP releases final list of candidates; Arvind Kejriwal to contest from New Delhi, Atishi fro - The Times of India
Why X users are congratulating Nirmala Sitharaman over world chess champion D Gukesh's win - ThePrint
summary:
Why X users are congratulating Nirmala Sitharaman over world chess champion D Gukesh's win

Publication Date: December 13, 2024 Source: The Print

Following D. Gukesh's historic win as the youngest World Chess Champion at 18, congratulatory messages have flooded in for both the champion and Finance Minister Nirmala Sitharaman, sparking a wave of humorous commentary regarding taxes on social media.

  • D. Gukesh defeated Ding Liren, becoming the second Indian to win the World Chess Championship title.
  • He earned approximately $600,000 (around ₹5.07 crore) from his victories in three games.
  • The total prize money of $1.5 million will be split between Gukesh and his competitor, totaling Gukesh's earnings to about $1.35 million (₹11.45 crore).
  • The Indian income tax rate for high earners is 30%, with a potential total tax obligation for Gukesh exceeding ₹4.67 crore due to additional surcharges.
  • Social media users humorously congratulated the income tax department for their share of Gukesh's winnings.

"The Indian Tax Department is always a step ahead, making sure they get their share of the winnings! Even in chess, they manage to checkmate the earnings." — Sarvesh Yadav (@Savy23_09)

Social media is filled with witty remarks, illustrating the humor surrounding the tax implications of Gukesh’s victory, showcasing the saying that "no victory is immune to India’s tax humour."

Delhi assembly polls: AAP's 4th list out, Kejriwal to contest from New Delhi - Hindustan Times
summary:
Delhi assembly polls: AAP's 4th list out, Arvind Kejriwal to contest from New Delhi

Publication Date: Dec 15, 2024 03:42 PM IST | Source: Hindustan Times

The Aam Aadmi Party (AAP) has released its fourth and final candidate list for the 2025 Delhi assembly elections, featuring Arvind Kejriwal and Chief Minister Atishi as key candidates in their respective constituencies.

  • Arvind Kejriwal will contest from New Delhi, while Atishi will field from Kalkaji.
  • The list includes 38 candidates, among them, Saurabh Bharadwaj, Gopal Rai, Satyendra Kumar Jain, and Durgesh Pathak.
  • Assembly elections for the 70-member Delhi assembly are scheduled for February 2025.
  • Kejriwal has ruled out any pre-poll alliance with the Congress, stating AAP will rely on its own strength.
  • Other notable candidates include Saurabh Bharadwaj from Greater Kailash and Gopal Rai from Babarpur.
"AAP's 10 years of misrule have brought Delhi to the brink of ruin." - Parvesh Sahib Singh, BJP candidate for New Delhi

This election is poised to be competitive, with Kejriwal likely to face sons of two former chief ministers, indicating a high-stakes battle for power in Delhi.

Pushpa 2 The Rule worldwide box office collection: Allu Arjun film sees 70% jump after arrest saga, beats SRK's Jawan - Hindustan Times
summary:
Pushpa 2 The Rule worldwide box office collection: Allu Arjun film sees 70% jump after arrest saga, beats SRK's Jawan

Publication Date: Dec 15, 2024 Source: Hindustan Times

Pushpa 2: The Rule has achieved remarkable box office success, crossing ₹1196 crore worldwide in just 10 days, fueled by a significant jump following the arrest of its lead actor, Allu Arjun.

  • The film saw a 70% increase in worldwide earnings after Arjun's arrest, with a 74% jump in the domestic market.
  • It earned ₹86 crore on its tenth day, surpassing Shah Rukh Khan's Jawan.
  • Overall, Pushpa 2 is nearing the ₹1200 crore mark and is now set to challenge KGF Chapter 2's record of ₹1208 crore.
  • The film has bolstered its overseas earnings, approaching $2 million on its tenth day.
  • Pushpa 2: The Rule is directed by Sukumar and features Allu Arjun alongside Rashmika Mandanna and Fahadh Faasil.
"Pushpa 2 should be able to cross KGF 2 on Sunday and then make a beeline for another blockbuster, SS Rajamouli's RRR (₹1309 crore)."

In conclusion, Pushpa 2's impressive performance at the box office demonstrates the film's popularity and the resilience of its leading star, Allu Arjun, amid controversy. The film is poised to continue its success trajectory in the coming days.

title: 'Pushpa 2' box office collection day 10: The film sees huge growth of 71 percent on Saturday, post Allu A - TOI Etimes
summary:
'Pushpa 2' Box Office Collection Day 10: The Film Sees Huge Growth of 71 Percent on Saturday, Post Allu Arjun's Arrest; Crosses Rs 820 Crore

Publication Date: December 14, 2023 Source: Times of India

Allu Arjun and Rashmika Mandanna's 'Pushpa 2' continues to break box office records, experiencing an impressive growth of 71% on its 10th day of release, following Arjun's brief arrest.

  • The movie collected Rs 62.3 crore on day 10, with Rs 46 crore from Hindi and Rs 13 crore from Telugu versions.
  • Total earnings in India have now reached Rs 824 crore across all languages.
  • Rs 498 crore of the total collection is from the Hindi version, surpassing the Telugu earnings.
  • 'Pushpa 2' has exceeded the lifetime collections of 'Jawan' and 'RRR'.
  • Anticipations are high for 'Pushpa 2' to achieve Rs 100 crore in its second weekend, which hasn't been seen since 'Baahubali 2' and 'Dangal'.
"This kind of growth is just unprecedented."

With the potential for further earnings likely on Sunday, 'Pushpa 2' is set to dominate the box office, especially before the upcoming competition from Varun Dhawan's 'Baby John'.

title: Bengaluru techie suicide: Subhash Atul's estranged wife Nikita Singhania, her brother and mother arrested - The Times of India
summary:
```html

Bengaluru techie suicide: Subhash Atul's estranged wife Nikita Singhania, her brother and mother arrested

Date: October 15, 2023 Source: Times of India

The tragic suicide of techie Subhash Atul in Bengaluru has led to the arrest of his estranged wife, Nikita Singhania, along with her brother and mother, as police investigate the circumstances surrounding his death.

  • Nikita Singhania, her brother, and mother were arrested in connection with Subhash Atul's suicide.
  • Subhash’s family pointed to issues in his marriage as a contributing factor to his decision.
  • Police are gathering evidence and testimonies from witnesses regarding the family dynamics.
  • The case has sparked discussions around mental health and domestic issues in urban areas.
"We are deeply saddened by the loss and hope justice is served," said a family spokesperson.

The arrests highlight the need for open conversations about mental health and the impact of strained relationships, aiming to prevent such tragic outcomes in the future.
```

title: Pushpa 2 Hindi Box Office Day 10: Allu Arjun Creates History Surpassing Stree 2’s 2nd Saturday – 3 Unbelievable Records Destroyed! - Koimoi
summary:
Pushpa 2 Hindi Box Office Day 10: Allu Arjun Creates History Surpassing Stree 2’s 2nd Saturday – 3

Publication Date: December 14, 2024

Source: Koimoi

Allu Arjun has set a new record at the box office with Pushpa 2, becoming the second South Indian film to cross the 500 crore mark, following Baahubali 2.

  • Pushpa 2 has grossed a total of 507.50 crore after 10 days.
  • On its tenth day, the film earned 46.50 crore, marking a 69% increase from the previous day.
  • The second weekend collections total 74 crore.
  • Highest earnings for Day 10 are recorded at 46 crore, surpassing Stree 2's 33.80 crore on its second Saturday.
  • Pushpa 2 is the fastest Hindi film to achieve the 500 crore milestone.
  • It is the seventh Hindi film to join the 500 crore club.
"Allu Arjun’s biggie has scored 39% higher earnings than Stree 2 on the second Saturday."

Key statistics show that Pushpa 2 is approaching the 600 crore club, likely achieving this in just a couple of days. The film's impressive performance highlights its popularity and strong box office presence.

Political slugfest over Allu Arjun continues as Congress defends Pushpa 2 star's arrest - Hindustan Times
summary:
Political slugfest over Allu Arjun continues as Congress defends Pushpa 2 star's arrest

Publication Date: Dec 15, 2024 Source: Hindustan Times

The arrest of Telugu actor Allu Arjun has incited a major political debate in Telangana, with various parties reacting differently to the incident tied to a tragic stampede during the premiere of "Pushpa 2: The Rule".

  • Allu Arjun was arrested in connection with a woman's death due to a stampede at the Sandhya Theatre during the film's premiere.
  • Congress defended the arrest, emphasizing that it is lawful and that the party supports adherence to the legal process.
  • Union Minister Ashwini Vaishnaw criticized Congress, claiming they disrespect the creative industry and misplace blame for poor theater arrangements.
  • YS Jagan Mohan Reddy, Andhra Pradesh opposition leader, condemned the arrest, suggesting it was unfair to hold Arjun accountable for the stampede.
  • Arjun was initially sent to 14-day judicial custody but was later granted interim bail by the Telangana High Court.
"The cases filed against Arjun are within the purview of law and the court granted him bail." - B Mahesh Kumar Goud, Telangana Congress president

The incident has highlighted tensions between political factions in Telangana, with stark differences in how they view responsibility for the tragedy and their attitudes toward the film industry. As reactions continue to unfold, it remains crucial to balance accountability with fair treatment of individuals involved.

title: MobiKwik IPO Allotment Date, Time: GMP soars! Check shares finalisation status online by PAN - GUIDE - ET Now

MobiKwik IPO Allotment Date, Time: GMP soars! Check shares finalisation status online by PAN - GUIDE

MobiKwik's IPO share finalisation is approaching, with high demand and a notable grey market premium indicating strong market interest.

  • Investors can check the status of their bids for MobiKwik's Rs 572 crore issue on Monday.
  • The allotment basis will be finalised around Monday as stated by MobiKwik.

Overall, the MobiKwik IPO demonstrates strong investor interest, and the upcoming share allotment could signal a promising listing on the stock exchanges.

title: Shiv Sena MLAs scramble for berths ahead of Maharashtra cabinet expansion today | What we know so far - Hindustan Times
summary:
Shiv Sena MLAs scramble for berths ahead of Maharashtra cabinet expansion today | What we know so far

Publication Date: Dec 15, 2024 | Source: HT News Desk

The swearing-in ceremony of the Maharashtra cabinet is set for Sunday evening, following intense discussions among the BJP, Shiv Sena, and NCP after their recent electoral victory. The upcoming expansion will see Ministers vying for key positions amid strategic portfolio discussions.

  • The cabinet expansion, coming before the winter assembly session, is led by Chief Minister Devendra Fadnavis.
  • The BJP is expected to receive 20-21 ministerial positions, with Shiv Sena and NCP obtaining 11-12 and 9-10, respectively.
  • Intense competition exists within the Shiv Sena, particularly among MLAs seeking ministerial roles.
  • Former ministers are struggling to secure positions, while certain controversial figures face opposition from the BJP.
  • Other political dynamics include complaints about certain MLAs' behavior and past controversies.
  • The Mahayuti coalition achieved a sweeping victory in the November assembly elections, securing 230 out of 288 seats.
“30-32 ministers are likely to take oath on Sunday, including 20 BJP leaders and the rest from Shiv Sena.”

The upcoming cabinet expansion is crucial for the Mahayuti government as it aims to solidify its position following a significant electoral victory and address internal party dynamics and public expectations.

title: Craving Sweets? Try Saumya Tandon's Healthy Sweet Potato Halwa Recipe For A Guilt-Free Indulgence - News18
summary:
Craving Sweets? Try Saumya Tandon's Healthy Sweet Potato Halwa Recipe For A Guilt-Free Indulgence

Date: December 15, 2024

Source: News18

Saumya Tandon shared a healthy recipe for sweet potato halwa that eschews sugar and its substitutes, promoting guilt-free indulgence.

  • Saumya Tandon has been sugar-free for four years, including honey and jaggery.
  • She discusses her lifestyle changes and shares a sweet potato halwa recipe in her recent Instagram video.
  • The recipe includes healthy ingredients like ghee and milk, focusing on natural sweetness.
  • Users can prepare the dish easily with simple steps provided in the article.

“I gave up sugar/all sugar substitutes, honey and jaggery 4 years ago. I only eat fruits and dry fruits and desserts made of them. It’s a game changer. Try!”

In conclusion, Saumya Tandon's journey towards a sugar-free diet inspires many to explore healthier dessert options without compromising on taste.

title: Paracetamol linked to side effects in digestive tract, heart, kidneys: Study - Moneycontrol
UP: Aarti performed after 46 years at ancient temple in Sambhal | Video - Hindustan Times
summary:
UP: Aarti performed after 46 years at ancient temple in Sambhal | Video

Publication Date: Dec 15, 2024 11:36 AM IST
Source: Hindustan Times

Aarti was performed for the first time in 46 years at the ancient Bhasma Shankar temple in Sambhal, Uttar Pradesh, after it was reopened by local authorities recently.

  • The temple was discovered during an anti-encroachment drive, where officials found it houses deities Lord Shiva and Hanuman.
  • This centuries-old temple had been closed since the 1978 communal riots.
  • Local authorities have initiated measures to restore the temple and ensure its security, including the installation of CCTV cameras.
  • Officials plan to hand over the temple to the community it originally belonged to and take action against encroachments.
"A Brahmin should be appointed here so that he can stay here. Till the time caretaker is appointed, we will take responsibility." - Acharya Brahm Shukla

The reopening of the temple marks a significant moment for the local community, rekindling spiritual practices that had been dormant for decades and promising to restore the temple to its original state.

title: New Zealand take control after O'Rourke, Santner trip up England - ESPNcricinfo
summary:
New Zealand take control after O'Rourke, Santner trip up England

Publication Date: October 2023 | Source: ESPNcricinfo

New Zealand dominated Day 2 of their Test match against England, showcasing exceptional bowling from Will O'Rourke and Mitchell Santner, coupled with solid batting performances leading them to a substantial lead.

  • New Zealand scored 347 runs, with Mitchell Santner contributing 76.
  • England managed only 143 runs in their first innings, suffering from a significant batting collapse.
  • Will O'Rourke delivered an impressive spell, taking three wickets for 33 runs.
  • Kane Williamson ended the day unbeaten on 50, as New Zealand reached 136 for 3 in their second innings.
  • New Zealand leads the match by 340 runs, aiming to end a streak of recent home defeats.
"A total of 143 all out was England's lowest in the first innings since their first outing under Brendon McCullum in June 2022."

In conclusion, New Zealand's strong performances in both bowling and batting have put them in a commanding position as they seek to turn around their fortunes in home Test cricket.

title: NYT Strands Answers For December 15: Today’s Spangram Could Be Hard To Find. Here Are The Solutions - ABP Live
summary:
NYT Strands Answers For December 15: Today’s Spangram Could Be Hard To Find. Here Are The Solutions.

Publication Date: December 15, 2024

Source: ABP Live Gaming

Tired of Wordle? The New York Times has launched Strands, a new word puzzle that challenges vocabulary skills by requiring players to find six to eight words hidden in a scrambled letter grid centered around a theme.

  • Strands is a daily puzzle available on the NYT Games section.
  • Players identify words based on a themed grid of 54 letters.
  • The game includes a hidden theme called Spangram, revealed after finding six words.
  • Today's theme is "Moonlighting" with answers including BUNNY, BELL, STAR, and others.
“The word spans the entirety of the grid. Add ‘span’ to ‘anagram’, and et voilà! You get Spangram.”

Stay tuned to ABP Live Gaming for more guides and stories about NYT Strands and other games.
